Company_Reference.description: The reference to the company associated with the grant draw. It's a required field.

Grant_Draw_Component_Description.description: Text field to specify a description for the grant draw component.

Grant_Draw_Component_ID.description: A unique identifier for the grant draw component.

Include_Grant_Draw_Component_ID_in_Name.description: A flag when set to true includes the Grant Draw Component ID along with the name.

Ledger_Account_Reference.description: The reference to the ledger account associated with the grant draw component.
